alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Eastern Ascension; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 08 at 3:54PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ascension, St. Helena, Livingston, southeastern East Feliciana, eastern East Baton Rouge Parishes in southeastern Louisiana and southeastern Amite Counties through 500 PM CST... At 353 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pride to near Gonzales. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Denham Springs, Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Greensburg, Walker, Livingston, Sorrento, French Settlement, Albany, Port Vincent, Montpelier, Old Jefferson, Darlington, Watson, Prairieville, Pride, Shenandoah, Greenwell Spring and Easleyville. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 167 and 184. Interstate 12 between mile markers 6 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall and frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Eastern Ascension; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; Western Ascension
